alert.note: Alert for Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:16PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Coconino and Yavapai Counties through 245 PM MST... At 216 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Munds Park, or 7 miles east of Sedona, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Munds Park and Manzanita Campground. This includes the following highways... Interstate 17 between mile markers 312 and 330. State Route 89A between mile markers 378 and 380. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Western Mogollon Rim; Yavapai County Mountains
